@notice Commit new contract owner
    @param _future_owner The contract owner to commit

natspec.author: Llama Risk

params._recipient: Address that can receive escrowed funds

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfer an asset to the specified recipient

params._token: The token to transfer, or NATIVE if transferring the chain native asset
params._value: The amount of the asset to transfer

natspec.notice: Allows owner to transfer native asset or ERC20 to a designated recipient
